Context: The Centre for Arts, Design and Information Technology at George Brown College offers 45 certificate, diploma and postgraduate programs in Toronto. For more information about application deadlines, college news, upcoming events, tours, and to sign up, visit the website or contact ask.george@georgebrown.ca. The phone number is 416-415-2000 and TTY number is 1-877-515-5559. The college has state-of-the-art facilities located in a vibrant and richly diverse city. There are 45 programs available, but the text does not specify which programs are offered for each creative field such as design, fashion, jewellery, drama, dance, digital production, computer programming or game development. The information contained in this website is subject to change without notice.
